original_text: He shall stretch out his hand against the countries, and the land of Egypt shall not escape.
korean_text: 그가 여러 나라들에 그의 손을 펴리니 애굽 땅도 면하지 못할 것이니

sentences.original_text: He shall stretch out his hand against the countries
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 여러 나라를 향해 손을 뻗을 것이며

sentences.original_text: the land of Egypt shall not escape
